text: hi, is it possible to listen on events generated by a chaincode via hfc ? i cannot find any reference  about that on the nodejs sdk docs
If it is FabricV0.6 then you can refer this sample  `<https://github.com/ratnakar-asara/NodeSdkSample/tree/master/events>`
<@U13Q594J2> thanks for the link, yes i'm using 0.6, `stub.SetEvent("myCustomEventName", []byte("test"))` is enough to emit my event in chaincode?
<@U3VRWUTDG> Yes I think that should be sufficient
